scenario_1.persona_desc: A game developer who specializes in creating educational and interactive video games with a focus on social and humanitarian causes. They have experience in using video games as a tool for teaching and raising awareness about real-world issues such as hunger and conflict. They are passionate about creating games that are not only entertaining but also have a positive impact on the world. They are also skilled in using technology to create immersive and engaging experiences for players.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the most money, which is Right. Even though Person A gets more, I still receive $400, which is the same as the Left option.
